alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 12 at 3:46AM CDT until August 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 2 to 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Milwaukee, Racine, and Kenosha counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Mckinley Beach in Milwaukee... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine... Simmons Island Beach in Kenosha...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
